Texts.Eng: You've gone ahead and cut the less tasty bits off. Nobody wants to eat cerebellum. ^red;-^white;10% ^red;HP ^gray;(^white;10s^gray;), ^blue;Madness Gain^reset; 2 ^red;Type: Raw Meat^reset;
Texts.Chs: 你已经把不太好吃的部分切掉了。没有人想吃小脑^red;-^white;10%^red;HP ^gray;（^white;10s^gray;），^blue;癫狂^reset;2 ^red;；类型：生肉^reset;
